title: Statement by NSC Deputy Spokesperson Mark Stroh On the Bombing in Istanbul, Turkey | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 07, 2016

 



Statement by NSC Deputy Spokesperson Mark Stroh On the Bombing in Istanbul, Turkey





	The United States condemns in the strongest possible terms today's terrorist attack in the heart of Istanbulâ€™s central tourist district, which appears to have targeted Turkish police forces. Our thoughts and prayers go out to those killed and injured, and to their loved ones. This horrific act is only the most recent of many terrorist attacks against Turkey. The United States stands together with Turkey, a NATO Ally and valued partner, as we confront many challenges in the region.
